content.c_venueAddress: 45 Queen Caroline St, Hammersmith, London W6 9QH
content.name: Only Fools and Horses The Musical

primaryPhoto.description:
Stick a pony in your pocket – The Trotters are back as the top-rated British television series Only Fools and Horses makes it’s return to London at the Eventim Apollo. It’s the landmark programme you know and love… just with a bit more song and dance!
Written by comedian Paul Whitehouse and Jim Sullivan, son of the late, great, original creator of the show John Sullivan, ONLY FOOLS AND HORSES – THE MUSICAL features the Trotters of Peckham in a riotous adventure with belly laughs and dodgy dealings a plenty!
This five star smash hit musical also revisits nostalgic and cherished moments from the series, and as well as musical contributions from the legendary Chas n Dave. Expect to hear the beloved theme tune as you have never heard it before, and an array of brand-new songs full of character and cockney charm, you’re guaranteed to have a right ol’ knees-up!
Book your ONLY FOOLS AND HORSES – THE MUSICAL theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
